name: Noble Woman's Pastries
description:
** Game

Role playing game.


** I want to make people happy with my pastries!

Rubine (aka Ruby) loves baking pastries. Her dream is to make the world a better place with her pastries.
She departs for a journey to train her pastry baking skills.

During her journey, Ruby meets various people.
She is also confronted with erotic events.
Despite her rape, she falls in love.
She also develops her fondness towards lesbian sex.


** Scripting & Illustration

21 Basic Illustrations.
* 7 Illustrations are non-sexual.

Rubine's attire is dependent on her HP. The lower this is, the more exposed she becomes.


** Pure love and lesbian sex of a young girl pursuing her life dream

To make the world a better place... Rubine's childhood dream was pure as a wedding dress.
This story details her growth in multiple regards.
She also falls in love.
She goes astray at times. She experiences deep lesbian sex. She may branch out to different paths.

There are three distinct endings.
There's no BAD end. Each ending is Rubine's destiny.
